review_text: Want to pay upward of $50 for a thing to hold your Kindle while you read a recipe from it in the kitchen?I didn't either.So I bought this very simple, very inexpensive book holder.  And guess what?  Somehow it doesn't seem to recognize that the Kindle is NOT a book and can be easily tricked into holding a Kindle in much the same fashion as it would an actual book!!!!  Go figure.
